subject: Re: Newbie Intro and Questions
author: earthangel5998
full_text:
Also...

Is there any way to "prepare" for recording like light a candle, 
meditate, etc? I am thinking maybe when I start sessions I can light a 
candle and when I end them I can blow the candle out kind of like a 
signal.

My grandfather-in-law and my father-in-law have both passed, should I 
try and ask for them by name or should I ask for anyone available? 

Sorry for the questions, I've never done this before! 

Thanks! 
Angela
